mapper.select: SELECT b.membersSeq ,b.membersName ,b.membersEmail ,b.membersGradeCd ,a.ordersSeq ,a.ordersDelNy ,a.ordersUseNy ,a.ordersStatusCd ,a.ordersPaymentCd ,a.ordersCardCompanyCd ,a.ordersCardNo ,a.ordersName ,a.ordersCardDate ,a.ordersCardCvv ,a.ordersFeeNy ,a.ordersPrice ,a.ordersTotalPrice ,a.ordersRegDate ,a.ordersModDate ,a.ordersAddressSeq ,a.members_membersSeq as membersMembersSeqF ,c.orders_ordersSeq as ordersOrdersSeqF ,c.product_productSeq as productProductSeqF ,c.productOrdersCount ,d.productSeq ,d.productName ,e.addressSeq ,e.addressTitle ,e.addressZipcode ,e.addressMain ,e.addressDetail ,e.addressEtc ,e.addressName ,e.addressPhone FROM orders a LEFT JOIN members b on b.membersSeq = a.members_membersSeq LEFT JOIN productorders c on c.orders_ordersSeq = a.ordersSeq LEFT JOIN product d on c.product_productSeq = d.productSeq LEFT JOIN address e on a.ordersAddressSeq = e.addressSeq WHERE a.members_membersSeq = #{membersMembersSeqF} and a.ordersDelNy = 0 ORDER BY a.ordersSeq limit 99999999999

select b.membersSeq ,b.membersName ,b.membersEmail ,b.membersGradeCd ,a.ordersSeq ,a.ordersDelNy ,a.ordersUseNy ,a.ordersStatusCd ,a.ordersPaymentCd ,a.ordersCardCompanyCd ,a.ordersCardNo ,a.ordersName ,a.ordersCardDate ,a.ordersCardCvv ,a.ordersFeeNy ,a.ordersPrice ,a.ordersTotalPrice ,a.ordersRegDate ,a.ordersModDate ,a.ordersAddressSeq ,a.members_membersSeq as membersMembersSeqF ,c.orders_ordersSeq as ordersOrdersSeqF ,c.product_productSeq as productProductSeqF ,c.productOrdersCount ,d.productSeq ,d.productName ,e.addressSeq ,e.addressTitle ,e.addressZipcode ,e.addressMain ,e.addressDetail ,e.addressEtc ,e.addressName ,e.addressPhone FROM orders a LEFT JOIN members b on b.membersSeq = a.members_membersSeq LEFT JOIN productorders c on c.orders_ordersSeq = a.ordersSeq LEFT JOIN product d on c.product_productSeq = d.productSeq LEFT JOIN address e on a.ordersAddressSeq = e.addressSeq where 1=1 and a.ordersDelNy = 0 and a.ordersSeq = #{ordersSeq}
mapper.update: update orders set ordersDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 and ordersSeq = #{ordersSeq}
